title: Wood Elf Lineage
excerpt: Embodying the spirit of primeval forests, wood elves are swift, perceptive, and have a primal connection to nature.
markdown:
# Wood Elf Lineage As an elf with Wood Elf lineage, you have a primal connection to nature. You possess the common traits of Elves, plus several unique benefits. --- ## Wood Elf Traits As a Wood Elf, you have the following racial traits.
Darkvision (Common Elf Trait)

You have Darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

Fey Ancestry (Common Elf Trait)

You have Advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the Charmed condition.

Keen Senses (Common Elf Trait)

You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

Trance (Common Elf Trait)

You don't need to sleep, and magic can't put you to sleep. You can finish a Long Rest in 4 hours if you spend those hours in a trancelike meditation, during which you retain consciousness.

Fleet of Foot (Wood Elf Trait)

Your base walking Speed increases to 35 feet.

Mask of the Wild (Wood Elf Trait)

You can attempt to hide even when you are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

Wood Elf Magic (Wood Elf Trait)

You know the Druidcraft cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you learn the Longstrider spell. When you reach 5th level, you learn the Pass without Trace spell. You always have these spells prepared, and you can cast them once per Long Rest without a spell slot, or by using spell slots of the appropriate level. Your spellcasting ability for these is your choice of Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma.

--- *Source: Player's Handbook (adapted)*
